param:
	reports = NULL
	grepped = NULL




# reports = c("path/file1", "path/file2", "path/file3")
# grepped = c("path/grep1", "path/grep2", "path/grep3")


data = tibble()

for file in reports
	tmp = read_tsv(file, header=TRUE)
	data = rbind(
		data,
		cbind(
			tmp,
			sample = file
		)
	)



g_data = tibble()

for file in grepped
	tmp = read_tsv(file, header=TRUE)
	g_data = rbind(
		g_data,
		cbind(
			tmp,
			sample = file
		)
	)
